title: [BUG] Upgrading to 2.88.3 crashed .NET (7.0) MAUI SKCanvas on Windows
body:
**Description**

<!-- a general description goes here -->
Upgrading to 2.88.3 on a basic .NET MAUI (.NET 7.0) SKCanvas causes an unhandled exception [36176/57572] on Windows
Please note this bug does not occur on .net 6.0.

**Code**
1. Create a .NET MAUI app (using .net 7.0)
2. Add SkiaSharp (2.88.3), SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls (2.88.3) & SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Core (2.88.3) packages
3. Add .UseSkiaSharp() in MauiProgram.cs builder
4. Clear demo code from MainPage and code-behind
5. Add an SKCanvas in MainPage.xaml

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<ContentPage xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui"
             xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml"
             xmlns:skia="clr-namespace:SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls;assembly=SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls"
             x:Class="SkiaCanvasSetup.MainPage">

    <Grid RowDefinitions="*" >
        <skia:SKCanvasView Grid.Row="0" x:Name="skiaView" 
                PaintSurface="OnPaintSurface"
                EnableTouchEvents="True" Touch="OnTouch" 
                IgnorePixelScaling="True">
        </skia:SKCanvasView>
    </Grid>

</ContentPage>
```
    
6. Add in events handler for OnTouch and OnPaintSurface
 
<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**

No unhandled exceptions

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**

Run the project for Windows - unhandled exception [36176, 57572, 47724]

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version:  2.88.2 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  VS 2022 Community (17.4.0 Preview 2.1)<!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code -->
- Platform Target Frameworks: net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0<!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
